name: 小糸
trans: Yeah, there's no wind at all...

name: 雛菜
trans: Hinana wants to have some shaved ice~!

name: 雛菜
text: あは～、雛菜イチゴにしよ～～～！

name: 透
text:
落ちてた、青いイルカ
ちっちゃいやつ
trans:
It fell out, that blue dolphin .
It's a small one.

name: 円香
text:
軽いし、転がりそう
キーホルダーでもなさそうだけど
trans:
It looks light, and it looks like something you can
fumble around. But it doesn't look like a key 
holder though.

name: 小糸
text:
あ……も、もしかして、あれじゃないかな……？
水に浮かせて遊ぶおもちゃ……
trans:
Ah... M-Maybe, it's one of those things...?
Those toys that can float on water...

name: 雛菜
trans:
Ah~, those that you catch when you play the
goldfish scooping game~?

name: 小糸
text:
う、うん
小さい頃、遊んだことがあったから……
trans:
Y-Yeah.
I've played it once when I was little...

name: 小糸
text: 水に浮かせて、掬うんだよ……！
trans: It floats on water, and you scoop it...!

name: 雛菜
text:
誰かが落としちゃったんでしょ～？
知らないけど～
trans:
Someone must have dropped it~?
Can't be sure though~

name: 雛菜
text:
え～、透先輩～？
どこ行くの～？
trans:
Eh~, Toru-senpai~?
Where are you going~?

name: 雛菜
text:
ん～……
イルカって川だっけ～？
trans:
Hm~...
Do dolphins live in the river~?

name: 小糸
text: で、でも、海に繋がってるんじゃないかな……？
trans: B-But, rivers connect to the sea, don't they...?

name: 円香
trans:
...So, what do we do now.
Shaved ice?

name: 雛菜
text:
あ～、食べたい～……
でも雛菜、疲れちゃった～～～……
trans:
Ah~, I wanna have some~...
But Hinana's tired~~~...

name: 小糸
text:
わ、わたしも……
ち、ちょっとだけ、日陰で休む……？
trans:
S-So am I...
S-Should we take a break under the shade...?

name: 小糸
trans: I-It's hot under the shade too...

name: 透
text:
なんか、ないかな
冷たいやつ、めっちゃ
trans:
What's, something.
That's like, super cold.

name: 透
text:
じゃ、想像しよ
入ってるとこ
trans: Then, let's imagine, going into it.

name: 小糸
text:
そ、そっか……つ、冷たい川に入ってるって思ったら
ちょっとは、涼しくなるかもね……！
trans:
I-I see... If we imagine ourselves going into the
cold water, maybe, we'll feel a little cooler...!

name: 小糸
text:
う、うん……！
す、涼しいね……！

name: off
text:
はずのイルカが、落ちてた
アスファルトの真ん中に
trans:
That should have floated, fell.
In the middle, on the asphalt.

name: off
trans: All dried up in the heat.

name: off
text: 今にも、死にそうだった
trans: It looked like it'd die at any moment.

name: off
trans:
It might all
be a dream.

name: 透
trans: It's fine, if it's all a dream.

name: 透
text:
ううん
帰れよー、イルカ
